title: (x) Fantasy Tea Parties - Action Is JNL/Groovy Happening JNL {Dennis Hill/Rainer}
content:
Anyone know the typeface of “Fantasy Tea Parties” at the top center of the web page below? Thanks!

[http://www.fantasyteaparty.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107033528/http:/www.fantasyteaparty.com/ "http://www.fantasyteaparty.com/")

 [‹ (x) Undercover Surrealism - Alternate Gothic {Jan E}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107033528/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34556 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Pearl Dragon" logo designed by Margo Chase - Custom designed {Mikey D} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107033528/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34519 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nick

comments.content:
Action Is by Jeff Levine and Brad Nelson, I think.

[http://desktoppub.about.com/library/fonts/dd/uc\_actionisall.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107033528/http:/desktoppub.about.com/library/fonts/dd/uc_actionisall.htm "http://desktoppub.about.com/library/fonts/dd/uc\_actionisall.htm")

Think so, too. If you’d prefer a font with lowercase letters, take [Groovy Happening JNL](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107033528/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/groovy-happening/) where Jeff Levine added them to his Action Is-font.
